creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: fan mounted as an album leaf, gold-dusted; mountainous landscape, water to left edge; six prominent trees at right in foreground with structure and valley behind
markings: artist\'s stamp, under signature; two collector\'s stamps, one at each lower corner
medium: Ink and color on gold-dusted paper
signed: [Wang Shimin] and 1667, in ink, at top edge left center
title: Landscape
